title: My Man Belongs To The Streets
itunes:title: My Man Belongs To The Streets
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a married woman in my mid-forties and my husband is too. We’ve been together a total of five years and we’ve been married three years. Early on, he explained that he had some medical issues that sometimes kept him from having sex. When we got married, we had only had sex once, but he had found other ways to please me, so I was happy and our marriage was great. I hoped and prayed that he could get his libido back and we could have sex like a real married couple...................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
